doc:
A. Edward Sutherland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A._Edward_Sutherland 0 Albert Edward Sutherland (January 5, 1895 – December 31, 1973) was a film director and actor. Born in London, he was from a theatrical family. His father, Al Sutherland, was a theatre manager and producer and his mother, Julie Ring, was a vaudeville performer. He was a nephew of both Blanche Ring and Thomas Meighan, who was married to Frances Ring, another of his mother's sisters.Sutherland acted in 37 known films early in his career, beginning as a Keystone Cop in Tillie's Punctured Romance (1914), which starred Charles Chaplin, Mabel Normand, and Marie Dressler. Albert_Edward_Sutherland ( January_5_,_1895 – December_31_,_1973 ) was a_film_director_and_actor . Born in London , he was from a_theatrical_family . His_father , Al_Sutherland , was a_theatre_manager and producer and his_mother , Julie_Ring , was a_vaudeville_performer .
